info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 01 at 12:23PM EDT until July 01 at 12:45PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN FREDERICK COUNTY IN NORTHWESTERN VIRGINIA AND SOUTHWESTERN BERKELEY COUNTIES IN THE PANHANDLE OF WEST VIRGINIA... At 1223 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles north of Winchester, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damaging winds will cause some trees and large branches to fall. This could injure those outdoors, as well as damage homes and vehicles. Roadways may become blocked by downed trees. Localized power outages are possible. Unsecured light objects may become projectiles. Locations impacted include... Inwood, Stephenson, Brucetown, Wadesville, Gainesboro, Cedar Hill, Cedar Grove, Clear Brook, Ridgeway and Bunker Hill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
